abstrac: Elevate Your Brand with Our Professional Brochures
bio:
Hi, I'm Zaheer abbas, and I specialize in creating captivating and informative brochures and presentations that showcase your brand and communicate your message effectively. With years of experience in the industry, I'm dedicated to delivering exceptional designs that exceed my client's expectations.

When it comes to brochure design, I understand the importance of creating a piece that stands out from the competition. I work closely with my clients to understand their unique value proposition and craft a design that captures the essence of their brand. Whether it's a tri-fold brochure, a flyer, or a booklet, I have the expertise to create a design that conveys your message in a visually stunning way.

My presentation design services are equally impressive. I believe that presentations should be engaging, informative, and visually appealing. I have expertise in creating presentations for a wide range of industries, from healthcare to technology. I utilize a range of multimedia elements, including videos, animations, and infographics, to create an immersive and memorable experience for your audience.

I pride myself on my ability to work closely with my clients to understand their needs and deliver designs that exceed their expectations. Whether you're looking for a new brochure design or a custom presentation, I have the skills and expertise to help you achieve your goals.

Contact me today to learn more about my brochure design and presentation design services and how I can help take your brand to the next level.

1. Scope of Work: The scope of work will be outlined in a detailed project brief, which will be agreed upon by both parties before starting the project.

2. Payment: Payment will be made through the Guru platform, and a deposit may be required before starting the project. Payment terms and milestones will be agreed upon in advance.

3. Revisions: A specified number of revisions will be included in the project scope. Additional revisions will be subject to additional fees.

4. Communication: Communication will primarily take place through the Guru platform, including messages, file sharing, and video conferencing.

5. Timelines: A project timeline will be agreed upon in advance, and both parties will be expected to adhere to it. If delays occur, the timeline may need to be adjusted accordingly.

6. Confidentiality: All information shared during the project will be treated as confidential and will not be shared with third parties.

7. Ownership: Upon completion of the project and receipt of full payment, ownership of the final deliverables will transfer to the client.

bio:
My background is in Statistics, Training, Assessment and Teaching.
I have a bachelor degree in teaching studies and a graduate diploma in management of learning.

For over 20 years my focus has been on clinical and organisational psychology, education design and psychometric assessment (development and validation). 

My passion is for helping people of all ages to discover their own joys in learning. Whether 6, 16 or 60 - learning simply must be engaging to have any intrinsic value. 
The point is to increase confidence, not deflate the soul. Embrace enigmas. 

Follow those random trains of thought on a journey to everywhere.
Come learn with me.


Bonus: Excel Tutoring for Bespoke Projects

Over 30 years I’ve refined and designed extremely complex spreadsheets that automate many dreary aspects of workplace reporting and assessment scoring, as well as monitoring for compliance within crucial validation and auditing protocols. Every project is individual, with each templates designed from scratch for maximum efficiency. What you specifically need is what I will design. Further, I fully welcome you getting to know your own spreadsheet, and learning to manage it yourself. While I will be here to help you evolve your project going forward, my goal is to share my knowledge and skills with others.

Located in Australia. 
Am ready and willing to work within your time zone and schedule.
Australian + US Citizen.

bio:
Want to make money selling eBooks on Amazon but afraid of receiving negative reviews about horrible spellings, grammar, or sentences? 
Here comes your easy one-stop place to get your book proof-edited and polished so that it is ready for publishing on Amazon.

Besides proof-editing your book, I also provide the following supplementary services:
- Writing an eBook filled with actionable and practical solutions to solve the readers' frustrations, so that your book can stand out against the highly competitive eBook market
- Writing an irresistible book description to help sell your book
- Marketing your Amazon eBooks, which includes optimising keywords and identifying categories to maximise your eBook's profitability
- Converting your eBook interior into Createspace paperback format which means extra sales from your ebook + paperback
- Designing an attention grabbing book cover to inspire and induce your readers to buy their copy right away
No obligations if you decide not to proceed after first draft
